name: Jurassic Circuits
description:
Jurassic Circuits is a playground for Gugus Claclé, the crocodile of cruelty.  

After spending some centuries in slumber, he realizes the new gods have taken over and he's really sad about it. So he goes around kicking balls, fighting with doofus dinosaurs who are gradually turning into new gods, trying to find the way to the ice world where the final showdown is scheduled to take place.
